title: Greyp T5 trekking e-bike takes smart connectivity out on tour & commutes
content:
Greyp’s new alloy T5 trekking hardtail eSUV combines a powerful e-bike powertrain with a unique combination of integrated technology far beyond anything you’re used to seeing in the cycling industry, including always-on free T-Mobile wireless mobile telecom connectivity. Beyond its e-motor, the T5 e-bike packs in hi-def front & rear cameras, built-in lighting, and full smartphone […]

The post Greyp T5 trekking e-bike takes smart connectivity out on tour & commutes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
